sarad.radonscout¶

Module for the communication with instruments of the Radon Scout family.

Module Contents¶

Classes¶

RscInst

Instrument with Radon Scout communication protocol

Functions¶

logger()

Returns the logger instance used in this module.

Attributes¶

_LOGGER

sarad.radonscout._LOGGER¶
sarad.radonscout.logger()¶

Returns the logger instance used in this module.

class sarad.radonscout.RscInst(port=None, family=None)¶

Bases: sarad.sari.SaradInst

Instrument with Radon Scout communication protocol

Inherited properties:

port: String containing the serial communication port family: Device family of the instrument expected to be at this port device_id: Identifier for an individual instrument in a cluster type_id type_name software_version serial_number components: List of sensor or actor components

Inherited methods from SaradInst:

get_reply()

Public methods:

get_all_recent_values() get_recent_value(index) set_real_time_clock(datetime) stop_cycle() start_cycle() get_config() set_config()

version = 0.1¶
_gather_all_recent_values(self)¶
_build_component_list(self) → int¶

Build up a list of components with sensors and measurands. Will be overriden by derived classes.

_get_battery_voltage(self)¶
_push_button(self)¶
get_all_recent_values(self)¶

Fill the component objects with recent readings.

get_recent_value(self, component_id=None, sensor_id=None, _=None)¶

Fill component objects with recent measuring values. This function does the same like get_all_recent_values() and is only here to provide a compatible API to the DACM interface

set_real_time_clock(self, rtc_datetime: datetime.datetime) → bool¶

Set the instrument time.

stop_cycle(self)¶

Stop a measurement cycle.

start_cycle(self, _)¶

Start a measurement cycle.

get_config(self)¶

Get configuration from device.

set_config(self)¶

Upload a new configuration to the device.

set_lock(self)¶

Lock the hardware button or switch at the device.

set_unlock(self)¶

Unlock the hardware button or switch at the device.

set_long_interval(self)¶

Set the measuring interval to 3 h = 180 min = 10800 s

set_short_interval(self)¶

Set the measuring interval to 1 h = 60 min = 3600 s

get_wifi_access(self)¶

Get the Wi-Fi access data from instrument.

set_wifi_access(self, ssid, password, ip_address, server_port)¶

Set the WiFi access data.

Data collector
